Therefore his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1245>him,<s%> "Let there be sought for my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H1330>virgin.<s%> Let her <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H5532>cherish<s%> <S%H7901>him;<s%> and let her lie in your <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> may keep <S%H2552>warm.<s%>"

Then <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> <S%H4984>exalted<s%> <S%H559>himself,<s%> saying, "I will be <S%H4427>king.<s%>" Then he <S%H6213>prepared<s%> him <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

He <S%H1697>conferred<s%> with <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> and with <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and they <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> helped <S%H5826>him.<s%>

But <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> and <S%H7472>Rei,<s%> and the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> who belonged to <S%H1732>David,<s%> were not with <S%H138>Adonijah.<s%>

<S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H2076>killed<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle<s%> and <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> by the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H2120>Zoheleth,<s%> which is <S%H681>beside<s%> En <S%H5883>Rogel;<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> all his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants:<s%>
but <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and the mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> he <S%H7121>didn't<s%> call.

Then <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>"Haven't<s%> you heard that <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> <S%H4427>reigns,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> our <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know it?

Now therefore <S%H3212>come,<s%> please let me give you <S%H3289>counsel,<s%> that you may <S%H4422>save<s%> your own <S%H5315>life,<s%> and the <S%H5315>life<s%> of your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H113>him,<s%> 'Didn't you, my lord, <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H7650>swear<s%> to your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>Assuredly<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3427>me,<s%> and he shall sit on my <S%H3678>throne?<s%> Why then does <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> <S%H4427>reign?<s%>'
<S%H1696>Behold,<s%> while you yet talk there with the <S%H4428>king,<s%> I also will come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4390>you,<s%> and confirm your <S%H1697>words.<s%>"

<S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> into the <S%H2315>room.<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2204>old;<s%> and <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> was <S%H8334>ministering<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
<S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H6915>bowed,<s%> and showed <S%H6915>respect<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "What would you like?"

She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H113>him,<s%> "My lord, you <S%H7650>swore<s%> by <S%H113>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> to your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> <S%H8010><s%> 'Assuredly Solomon your <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3427>me,<s%> and he shall sit on my <S%H3678>throne.<s%>'
<S%H138>Now,<s%> behold, Adonijah <S%H4427>reigns;<s%> and <S%H113>you,<s%> my lord the <S%H4427>king,<s%> <S%H3045>don't<s%> know it.

<S%H113>You,<s%> my lord the <S%H4428>king,<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are on <S%H5046>you,<s%> that you should tell them who shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> after <S%H310>him.<s%>

Otherwise it will <S%H113>happen,<s%> when my lord the <S%H4428>king<s%> shall <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> that I and my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> shall be counted <S%H2400>offenders.<s%>"
<S%H1696>Behold,<s%> while she yet talked with the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> came <S%H935>in.<s%>

They <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5416>"Behold,<s%> Nathan the <S%H5030>prophet!<s%>" When he had come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself before the <S%H4428>king<s%> with his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

<S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> have you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H138><s%> 'Adonijah shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3427>me,<s%> and he shall sit on my <S%H3678>throne?<s%>'

For he is gone <S%H3381>down<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and has <S%H2076>slain<s%> <S%H7794>cattle<s%> and <S%H4806>fatlings<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> and has <S%H7121>called<s%> all the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>army,<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%> <S%H398>Behold,<s%> they are eating and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and say, <S%H2421><s%> 'Long live <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah!<s%>'

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> to me <S%H1339>Bathsheba.<s%>" She <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>presence,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7650>swore,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> who has <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of all <S%H6869>adversity,<s%>

most certainly as I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to you by <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8010><s%> 'Assuredly Solomon your <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3427>me,<s%> and he shall sit on my <S%H3678>throne<s%> in my <S%H6213>place;<s%>' most certainly so will I do this <S%H3117>day.<s%>"

Then <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> with her <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and showed <S%H7812>respect<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever!<s%>"

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> to me <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada.<s%>" They <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then you shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H935>him,<s%> and he shall come and <S%H3427>sit<s%> on my <S%H3678>throne;<s%> for he shall be <S%H4427>king<s%> in my <S%H6680>place.<s%> I have appointed him to be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and over <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>"

<S%H3129>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah,<s%> "Most <S%H61>certainly<s%> our <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> has made <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4428>king.<s%>
